name: Trial of Anubis
description:
Awoken from a deep Slumber, or so you think at first, you open your eyes.. realising that you've  Risen from the Dead. You don't Remember your past. You  don't know why you are under the living again, but what you do know, is that you are not alone. 

There is a Presence, he knows you've awoken and he is not pleased by it.  He is following your every step, ready to hunt, to sent you back from  where you came from, to  fulfill his duties, as He is The God of Death, Anubis!

Trial of Anubis, 

is a   Puzzle-Horror Game in which you have to escape the Tomb where you have awoken, while the God of Death Anubis prevents you from leaving.

You will experience Scary Moments, Close Calls and a high dose of Adrenaline. These come with thrilling Chases, challenging Puzzles and always having  the feeling of something watching you, wherever you go.

   

   

   

     

   


Trial of Anubis has an estimated gameplay length of 30 minutes

All of this and more will await you  playing The Trial of Anubis.

This Game is part of a 3 week School Project. We hope you enjoy our Game as much as we did Developing it.

Have fun and never forget, Anubis always keeps track!

Minimum Requirements

OS: Windows 10 64-bit

Memory: 8 GB RAM

Graphics:   GTX 1060 TI

Storage:   2 GB available space

Install Instructions
  • Download the ZIP file
  • Unzip the file to your desired save place
  • Open up the file and start the .exe
